frontMatter.title: A palm-size IO board for Raspberry Pi CM5 — my hands-on review and tests | CM5 Minima From Seeed Studio

frontMatter.summary: Hands-on with a palm-size Raspberry Pi Compute Module 5 IO board: M.2 NVMe, Gigabit Ethernet, USB-C PD, 4K60 HDMI. Setup tips, eMMC flashing, thermals, and real-world speed tests.
